m_szDocTitle: Power generation methods and systems - Ruggieri, Frank
m_szDocSumamry: Power generation methods and systems United States Patent Application 20060186669 Kind                 Code: A1 Abstract: Thermodynamic energy methods and systems that provides all electrical energy and heat needs of a single residential house, commercial business or office building. The system is small enough to be stored inside the house or building. The system can generate excess electrical energy which can be sold over a power grid and allow for the house owner, building owner or energy provider (utility company) to provide income. The method and system can have combined energy conversion
